Package model

Interface ClientUserModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ModelUser, utility.observer.javaobserver.UnnamedPropertyChangeSubject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Model
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelManager
    public interface ClientUserModel
extends ModelUser
    Interface containing methods only running on client side (are not used on server side), as their purpose is handling current order of the client (it is handled by client and only sent to server after it is finalized or to update the stock for other users). Also extending ModelUser interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearBag()
      Method running when client suddenly closes the app, clears the bag of a client, ensuring that all items return to the stock by calling server
      Order getOrder()
      Getter for current client's order
      int getQuantityOfItemsInBag()
      Method returning sum of items' quantities in a current client's order
      void removeItemFromBag​(Item item)
      Method removing item from a client's current order, calling the server to update stock
      void setDelivery​(java.lang.String pickUpTime)
      Setter for delivery options of an order when pick-up delivery type is chosen
      void setDelivery​(java.lang.String addressLinePrimary, java.lang.String addressLineSecondary, java.lang.String city, int postalCode)
      Setter for delivery options of an order when "delivery to address" is chosen as delivery type
      void setEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Setter for email in order
      void setPayment​(java.lang.String cardName, long cardNumber, int expirationMonth, int expirationYear, int securityCode)
      Method validating client's payment info (it is placeholder in this version of the system, to showcase the flow of an app)

      • Methods inherited from interface model.ModelUser

        addItemToOrder, completeOrder, getAllProducts, getAllShops, getItemsByProduct, getLowestPriceOfProduct, getProduct, getProductsByCategory, getQuantityOfCertainProduct, getSpecificItem, removeItemFromOrder

    • Method Detail

      • setDelivery

        void setDelivery​(java.lang.String pickUpTime)
        Setter for delivery options of an order when pick-up delivery type is chosen
        Parameters:
        pickUpTime - String containing time at which order will be picked up by client

      • setDelivery

        void setDelivery​(java.lang.String addressLinePrimary,
                 java.lang.String addressLineSecondary,
                 java.lang.String city,
                 int postalCode)
        Setter for delivery options of an order when "delivery to address" is chosen as delivery type
        Parameters:
        addressLinePrimary - String containing primary line of client's address
        addressLineSecondary - String containing secondary line of client's address (optional)
        city - String containing name of the city
        postalCode - number representing client's postal code

      • setEmail

        void setEmail​(java.lang.String email)
        Setter for email in order
        Parameters:
        email - String containing client's email

      • setPayment

        void setPayment​(java.lang.String cardName,
                long cardNumber,
                int expirationMonth,
                int expirationYear,
                int securityCode)
        Method validating client's payment info (it is placeholder in this version of the system, to showcase the flow of an app)
        Parameters:
        cardName - name of the owner of the card
        cardNumber - number of the client's card
        expirationMonth - number representing month in which the card expires
        expirationYear - number representing year in which the card expires
        securityCode - 3 digits' number on the back of the card

      • getOrder

        Order getOrder()
        Getter for current client's order
        Returns:
        client's current order

      • clearBag

        void clearBag()
        Method running when client suddenly closes the app, clears the bag of a client, ensuring that all items return to the stock by calling server

      • removeItemFromBag

        void removeItemFromBag​(Item item)
        Method removing item from a client's current order, calling the server to update stock
        Parameters:
        item - item object that will be removed from an order

      • getQuantityOfItemsInBag

        int getQuantityOfItemsInBag()
        Method returning sum of items' quantities in a current client's order
        Returns:
        number representing total sum of quantity of items in an order
